co.cask.cdap.test

Interface WorkflowManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProgramManager<WorkflowManager>

    public interface WorkflowManager
extends ProgramManager<WorkflowManager>
    Workflow manager interface for managing the workflow and its schedules

    • Method Summary

      Get the ScheduleManager instance to manage the schedule

      • getToken

        co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenDetail getToken(String runId,
                                              @Nullable
                                              WorkflowToken.Scope scope,
                                              @Nullable
                                              String key)
                                                throws co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException
        Get the WorkflowTokenDetail for the specified workflow run.
        Parameters:
        runId - the specified workflow run id
        scope - the WorkflowToken.Scope. Defaults to WorkflowToken.Scope#USER
        key - the specified key. If null, returns all key-value pairs
        Returns:
        the WorkflowTokenDetail for the specified workflow run
        Throws:
        co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException

      • getTokenAtNode

        co.cask.cdap.proto.WorkflowTokenNodeDetail getTokenAtNode(String runId,
                                                        String nodeName,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        WorkflowToken.Scope scope,
                                                        @Nullable
                                                        String key)
                                                          throws co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException
        Returns the WorkflowTokenNodeDetail for the specified workflow run at the specified node.
        Parameters:
        runId - the specified workflow run id
        nodeName - the specified node name
        scope - the WorkflowToken.Scope. Defaults to WorkflowToken.Scope#USER
        key - the specified key. If null, returns all key-value pairs emitted by the specified node
        Returns:
        the WorkflowTokenNodeDetail for the specified workflow run at the specified node.
        Throws:
        co.cask.cdap.common.NotFoundException
